Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Enacts the "washing machine microfiber filtration act"
Summary: Requires washing machines sold after a certain date to contain a microfiber filtration system that meets certain specifications.
LawCode: Add ยง396-uu, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to enacting the "washing machine microfiber filtration act"
